title: U.S. household expenditure on sewing machines 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The line significantly increased by 6.64 from Year 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 8.18 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 1.54 was reported at Year 2017
